General.Name: The Mediterranean&Gulf Insurance Co
General.Description: The Mediterranean and Gulf Cooperative Insurance and Reinsurance Company provides insurance and reinsurance products and related activities in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. The company offers third party and comprehensive motor insurance products, as well as medical insurance products. It also provides travel, aviation, property, personal accident, engineering, employer liability, professional indemnity, money, fidelity, bankers blanket, marine cargo, and marine hull insurance products. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Riyadh, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.

6.Name: Mr. Saleh Ali Alsugair
6.Title: Gen. Mang. of Legal & Governance Affairs and Board Sec.
